summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the levy and collection of a new assessment or An Ordinance providing for the rebating and refunding of the excess portions of all assessment levied for the improvement of-assessment to pay the cost and expense of and for the improvement of Shilshole venue, in the City of Seattle, formerly in the City of Ballard, as specified and provided for in Ordinance No. 646, of the former City of Ballard, and providing for the payment therefor.
